commandNotFound.title: **Oops...!**
description: The Command you are trying to use does not exist.
Look at the list of commands with ``"help"``

commandErrors.ExecutionError: There was an error executing that command.
commandErrors.userWithoutPermission: :exclamation: You do not have the necessary permission to execute this command.

help.description: List all of my commands or info about a specific command.

options.commandName: Show info about a specific command

commandArgs.notFound:
This command has no **Options**.
 Just use `` /{{commandName}} ``​
